typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct DataTypes.ReserveState memory,contract IBatchVaultPriceOracle) view returns (uint256)

GovernorChangeRequested(address).notice: Emmited when the governor is change is requested

GovernorChanged(address,address).notice: Emmited when the governor is changed

acceptGovernance().notice: Called by the pending governor to approve the change

cancelInitiative().notice: Cancel the active initiative without claming rewards

changeGovernor(address).notice: Changes the governor can only be called by the current governor

checkpoint((uint256,(address,uint8,addre.notice: Variant of `checkpoint()` where the reserve state is passed in; only callable by Motherboard.

checkpoint().notice: Update the internally tracked variables. Called internally but can also be called by anyone.

completeInitiative().notice: Complete the active initiative and claim rewards. Rewards are sent to the governance treasury address. The initiative period must have passed while the reserve health conditions have held, and they must currently still hold. Callable by anyone.

hasActiveInitiative().notice: Whether there is an active initiative.

hasFailed().notice: Whether the initiative has already failed. This does *not* include any information based on the current state that would be included when `checkpoint()` is called. `false` if there is no active initiative.

params.rewardPercentage: Share of the average GYD supply over time that should be paid as a reward. How much *will* actually be paid will also depend on the system state when the incentive is completed.

tentativeRewards().notice: Rewards (in GYD) that the governance treasury would receive if the initiative had ended and `completeInitiative()` was called now.
